sources.name: source1
sources.script:
source(output(
		CustomerID as integer,
		NameStyle as boolean,
		Title as string,
		FirstName as string,
		MiddleName as string,
		LastName as string,
		Suffix as string,
		CompanyName as string,
		SalesPerson as string,
		EmailAddress as string,
		Phone as string,
		PasswordHash as string,
		PasswordSalt as string,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp,
		ChangeHashKey as string,
		CreateBatchId as integer,
		CreateDateTime as timestamp,
		UpdateBatchId as integer,
		UpdateDateTime as timestamp,
		SYS_CHANGE_VERSION as long,
		SYS_CHANGE_CREATION_VERSION as long,
		SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION as string,
		SYS_CHANGE_CONTEXT as any
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: true,
	batchSize: 5000,
	format: 'table') ~> source1
